name: Plume Tomb
description:
Plume Tomb is a unique labyrinth style puzzle game where you must navigate the Tomb to activate the Pressure Plates without falling victim to the rogue Goblin Geese or the deadly Spike Traps. Once the Pressure Plates have all been activated, make your way through the Trap Door to the next layer of the Tomb.

What is your highest score?

Movement is controlled with the W-A-S-D keys.

We hope you enjoy this game and we look forward to any feedback.

Windows and Mac executable download available below.

Enjoy our games? Feel free to take a look at our other work on Patreon.
